A delightful assortment of ramen is available at Kitakata Ramen Bar in Berlin. Notable options include the Tonkotsu and Creamy Chicken ramens. The Tonkotsu ramen showcases a rich, savory broth derived from pork bones and a mouthwatering slice of tender pork. The Creamy Chicken ramen offers a velvety broth flavored with chicken bones and a scrumptious chicken fillet. The noodles are expertly prepared, and toppings such as marinated eggs, bamboo shoots, and seaweed elevate the dishes with a refined touch. Kitakata Ramen Bar's ramen is a must for ramen connoisseurs in Berlin.

"Le Coin des Crêpes in Berlin ist ein wahrer Genuss für alle Crepe-Liebhaber! Die Bestellung eines Hähnchen-Pot-Pie-Crepes und einer Crêpe Suzette war eine ausgezeichnete Entscheidung. Der Hähnchen-Pot-Pie-Crepe war mit saftigem Hähnchenfleisch, Sahne, Erbsen und Karotten gefüllt, abgerundet mit einer cremigen Soße und herzhaften Kräutern. Die Crêpe Suzette war ein süßer Abschluss mit ihrer zarten Crêpe, kombiniert mit süß-saurer Orangenmarmelade und einer Prise Grand Marnier. Der Service war schnell und freundlich, und das Essen war heiß und lecker. Ich kann Le Coin des Crêpes in Berlin nur wärmstens empfehlen!"

The food at Smoky BBQ was a major disappointment. The ribs were dry and flavorless, the salad was limp and uninspired, and the bottled water was warm. The service was equally bad. The waiter was rude and unhelpful, and the wait time was excessive. Overall, I would not recommend Smoky BBQ to anyone.

Smoky BBQ truck in Tokyo fell short of expectations. Two Meat Plate and Ribs of Pork were disappointingly dry and devoid of smoky flavor. Ice Tea and Bottled Soda were the only redeeming aspects, yet insufficient to compensate for the subpar experience. Three Meat Plate fared no better, offering tough, overcooked meat. For a BBQ truck, Smoky BBQ failed to deliver the succulent, tender meats required for an enjoyable BBQ encounter. The name promised more.

"Not the Wurst Hot Dogs" truly lives up to its name, offering an exceptional hot dog experience in Vancouver. The New York Dog, Chicago Dog, and Coney Dog were all packed with flavor, showcasing the perfect balance of quality ingredients. The buns were fresh, and the toppings were generously portioned. The Bottled Soda and Ice Tea were refreshing accompaniments, rounding out the meal nicely. This is a must-visit for hot dog enthusiasts, offering a delightful culinary journey across different hot dog styles. The service was prompt and friendly, making the overall experience even more enjoyable. I'm already looking forward to my next visit!

Tasty Tibs truck delivers a delightful Ethiopian culinary experience right in the center of Seoul. The Lean Chicken Tibs and Veggie Combo, both ordered, proved to be gratifying choices. The chicken's tenderness and rich flavor harmonized well with the fresh, crisp vegetables. Accompanied by warm, fluffy injera bread and a zesty berbere spice, the dish was a true sensation. Overall, the genuine Ethiopian tastes coupled with the amiable service at Tasty Tibs made for an enjoyable dining experience.

The Tasty Tibs truck in Sydney serves up authentic Ethiopian fare. The lean chicken tibs and veggie combo were flavorful and well-portioned. The chicken was tender and the vegetables were fresh and crisp. The injera, a traditional Ethiopian flatbread, was soft and fluffy, perfect for soaking up the delicious sauce. Overall, the food was satisfying and the service was friendly.

This order was an absolute disaster. The seitan wings were dry and flavorless, and the salad was limp and unappetizing. The only thing saving this order from being a complete disappointment was the friendly delivery driver. I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone.

¡Guac n' Roll é simplesmente espetacular em São Paulo! Eu adorei me deliciar com o Three Taco Combo Plate. Os tacos são deliciosos e cheios de sabor, com uma deliciosa guarnição de aguacate. A qualidade dos ingredientes é óptima e o serviço é sempre amigável e eficiente. Se você está procurando por uma deliciosa opção de tacos em São Paulo, Guac n' Roll é definitivamente a escolha perfeita. Não perca a oportunidade de experimentar seus deliciosos tacos!

The Tandoori Mixed Grill from Nani's Kitchen offered a delightful exploration of Indian cuisine here in Sao Paulo. The dish presented a harmonious blend of flavors, with each component of the grill complementing the others well. The meats were tender and succulent, although a slightly longer marination might have allowed for an even deeper infusion of spices. The accompanying vegetables were fresh and crisp, offering a pleasant contrast in texture. Overall, the meal provided a satisfying experience, but stopping short of being truly exceptional. It's a solid choice for those seeking a taste of Indian cuisine in the city.

Although I was excited to try the unique "Guac n' Roll" truck, I was ultimately disappointed with the food and service. The burritos were filled with cheap ingredients that tasted bland and unappetizing. The chicken and fish in the fish and chicken burritos tasted overcooked and rubbery, while the beans tasted mushy and undercooked. The bottled water and ice tea were also lukewarm, which further added to the overall negative experience. Furthermore, the staff was unfriendly and inefficient, taking a long time to take my order and neglecting to provide me with the necessary utensils. Overall, I would not recommend this truck to anyone and would suggest finding a more authentic and flavorful food truck.

The Not the Wurst Hot Dogs truck's "Coney Dog" lived up to its name, delivering a satisfying bite in the heart of Barcelona. The hot dog was juicy and flavorful, topped with fresh toppings and a sprinkle of charm. The friendly staff were quick to take my order and had me digging into my delicious treat in no time. The atmosphere was relaxed and inviting, perfect for a casual lunch on the go. Overall, a thumbs up for Not the Wurst Hot Dogs - a must-try for any hot dog fan visiting Barcelona.

"Le Coin des Crêpes truly delivered an exceptional dining experience. The Chicken Pot Pie Crepe was a delightful surprise, combining the comfort of a classic pot pie with the elegance of a French crepe. The Crepe Suzette was a symphony of sweet and tangy flavors, expertly prepared. The Ice Tea was refreshing, the perfect accompaniment to the meal. The quality of food and service was top-notch. I highly recommend this hidden gem in London for anyone seeking a unique and delicious culinary adventure."

While I was initially excited to try the "Miss Piggie" sandwich with the "The Mega Melt" truck, my experience was unfortunately quite negative. The bread was stale and crumbly, and the fillings were sparse and bland. The bottled soda was also warm and unrefreshing. Overall, I was very disappointed with the quality of the food and the lack of flavor.

The order, consisting of a veggie taco bowl, lean burrito bowl, and a two taco combo plate, was a disaster. The taco shell was stale and the fillings were sparse. The burrito wrap was also stale and the fillings were not evenly distributed. The taco sauce was too sweet and the burrito sauce was too sour. In conclusion, I would not recommend ordering from this establishment.

A delightful experience with Peking Truck's combo Lo Mein and Fried Rice. Noodles boasted perfect cookery, adorned with an abundance of fresh vegetables and meat. Rice in the fried version was flavorful with tender grains and crispy vegetables. Generous portions accompanied the meal, while friendly service added to the enjoyment. Authentic Chinese cuisine seekers in Krakow are highly recommended to try this truck.

The Tasty Tibs truck in Madrid is a must-try for any foodie. I ordered the lean chicken and beef tibs, as well as the veggie combo. The meat was tender and flavorful, and the veggies were fresh and crispy. The injera bread was soft and fluffy, and the overall meal was simply delicious. The service was friendly and efficient, and the prices were reasonable. I highly recommend checking out Tasty Tibs if you're looking for a authentic Ethiopian dining experience in Madrid.

The Smoky BBQ truck in Madrid failed to impress. The Spring Mix Salad was far from fresh, wilted and unappetizing. The Two Meat Plate, which should have been the star, was disappointingly dry and lacked the smoky flavor promised by the truck's name. The overall experience was underwhelming and did not live up to the expectations set by a BBQ truck. I would not recommend this to anyone seeking a satisfying BBQ meal.

"El camión de comida 'The Mega Melt' en Madrid decepcionó mi esperanza de una buena experiencia de comida. Ordené el sándwich 'Miss Piggie' del menú de sándwiches de queso grillado y encontré que la relación calidad-precio era pobre. La carne de cerdo era seca y sin sabor, y el queso no se derretía adecuadamente. Aunque la presentación fue atractiva, el sabor y la textura dejaron mucho que desear. Desafortunadamente, no recomendaría este camión de comida a otros en busca de una buena experiencia de sándwich de queso grillado en Madrid."

The Le Coin des Crêpes menu is a dream come true for crepe lovers. The fresh, fluffy crepes are made with the perfect balance of sweetness and savory flavors. The Suzette crepe, with its decadent spread of fresh fruit and whipped cream, is a must-try for anyone with a sweet tooth. The breakfast crepe, filled with fresh fruit, granola, and powdered sugar, is a hearty way to start your day. And the chicken pot pie crepe, with its flaky pastry and tender chicken filling, is a perfect comfort food. The accompanying bottled soda and ice tea are refreshing and complement the crepes perfectly. Overall, Le Coin des Crêpes offers a delightful culinary experience that is sure to satisfy your appetite.

"Guac n' Roll truly rolls out a fiesta of flavors! I recently savored their Veggie Taco Bowl and Three Taco Combo Plate in Mumbai, and it was an absolute delight. The Veggie Taco Bowl was a vibrant medley of fresh veggies, perfectly seasoned and nestled in a bed of fluffy rice. The Three Taco Combo Plate was a trio of joy, each taco bursting with unique flavors, yet harmoniously blending together. The truck's commitment to quality ingredients and authentic recipes shines through in every bite. If you're a taco enthusiast, Guac n' Roll is a must-visit. Their menu is a tribute to the rich culinary heritage of tacos, and they serve it up with a side of warmth and friendliness. Can't wait for my next visit!"
